nodes.text: Yoshi was one of Chelli Lona Aphra's lovers while they both attended the University of Bar'leth. Shortly after their first encounter, Yoshi became very sick with Wookiee flu, which Aphra found disgusting. Sana Starros asked Aphra about Yoshi, aware that the two had been seeing each other before she and Aphra began a relationship, but Aphra explained that she was no longer seeing anyone besides Starros.
